text:
The film centers around Ryan Cooper's body, and we're okay with that.

While Ryan Cooper may not make it through much of Rough Night alive, he certainly makes an impression during his time on screen.

The model plays a stripper in the upcoming comedy, which stars Scarlett Johansson, Kate McKinnon, Zoë Kravitz, Jillian Bell and Ilana Glazer as five friends who reunite for a bachelorette weekend in Miami. But things take a turn for our heroines after they accidentally kill Cooper’s character during a lap dance.

While we expect to experience loads of laughs from the ladies throughout the movie, it’s Cooper that’s providing us with the eye candy—at least while he’s still breathing. Get to know him better with some of the sexiest snaps from his Instagram ahead of the film’s release on June 16.
